status.info: We use this protocol and it's working

steps.step: {"blocks":[{"key":"7gpln","text":"Mix recombinant proteins TBK1 or ULK1-complex (composed of ULK1, FIP200, ATG13, and ATG101) and NAP1 in kinase buffer.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"3e1fa","text":"Use the kinases at   and mix with   NAP1.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":19,"length":1},{"key":1,"offset":34,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"65eib","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"concentration","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"concentration":"50","error_concentration":false,"guid":"FBD4DD6014E211EE8B6C15BC852C8471","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"unit":30}},"1":{"type":"concentration","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"concentration":"250","error_concentration":false,"guid":"02E4E0F014E311EE8B6C15BC852C8471","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"unit":30}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"d4g0","text":"Start the kinase reactions by the adding 2x ATP/MgCl2 kinase buffer to a final concentration of   MgCl2 and   ATP.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"sub","offset":52,"length":1},{"style":"sub","offset":102,"length":1}],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":96,"length":1},{"key":1,"offset":108,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"5c25l","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"concentration","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"concentration":"10","error_concentration":false,"guid":"29BC92E014E311EE8B6C15BC852C8471","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"unit":28}},"1":{"type":"concentration","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"concentration":"100","error_concentration":false,"guid":"2E27B53014E311EE8B6C15BC852C8471","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"unit":28}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"6nnlr","text":"Prepare protein mixtures as master mixes and divide over the number of time points. ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"81btm","text":"To control for potential protein instability, induce the latest time point first and then go gradually to the shortest time point.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"32qr9","text":"In this way, keep all protein mixtures at   for the same time, and terminate the reactions together.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":42,"length":1}],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"temperature","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"error_temperature":false,"guid":"763444A014E411EE8B6C15BC852C8471","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"temperature":"","unit":32}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"a70mj","text":"Achieve the termination of reactions by the addition of 6x Protein Loading dye and heat inactivation at   for  .","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":104,"length":1},{"key":1,"offset":110,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"eaga6","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"temperature","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"error_temperature":false,"guid":"AD57DE6014E411EE8B6C15BC852C8471","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"temperature":"95","unit":10}},"1":{"type":"duration","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"duration":300,"guid":"AFD3DAE014E411EE8B6C15BC852C8471","id":0,"label":"","pause":null,"preset":[],"start":null}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"50q9t","text":"Separate the samples on 4-12% SDS-PAGE gels (NP0321BOX, NP0322BOX, or NP0323BOX, Thermo Fisher) with PageRuler Prestained protein marker (Thermo Fisher).","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"fock4","text":"After the run, either stain the SDS-PAGE gel with Coomassie or transfer to nitrocellulose membranes for western blot analysis. ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"bt940","text":"In the case of Coomassie staining, incubate the gel for   in Coomassie solution, fix for   with fixation solution, and then destain it   in dH2O. ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"sub","offset":142,"length":1}],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":56,"length":1},{"key":1,"offset":89,"length":1},{"key":2,"offset":135,"length":1}],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"duration","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"duration":600,"guid":"22C360C014E511EE8B6C15BC852C8471","id":0,"label":"","pause":null,"preset":[],"start":null}},"1":{"type":"duration","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"duration":600,"guid":"BB7ECDE014E511EE8B6C15BC852C8471","id":0,"label":"","pause":null,"preset":[],"start":null}},"2":{"type":"duration","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"duration":600,"guid":"FC44FCF014E511EE8B6C15BC852C8471","id":0,"label":"","pause":null,"preset":["overnight"],"start":null}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"dllec","text":"Cut the band corresponding to NAP1 from the gel with a fresh scalpel and submit for mass spectrometry analysis.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"9bei6","text":"In the case of western blotting, transfer the proteins onto nitrocellulose membranes (RPN132D, GE Healthcare) for   at   using the Mini Trans-Blot Cell (Bio-Rad). ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":114,"length":1},{"key":1,"offset":119,"length":1}],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"duration","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"duration":3600,"guid":"43ABCBF014E611EE8B6D15BC852C8471","id":0,"label":"","pause":null,"preset":[],"start":null}},"1":{"type":"temperature","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"error_temperature":false,"guid":"4602DB5014E611EE8B6D15BC852C8471","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"temperature":"4","unit":10}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"76boj","text":"Process the membranes further for western blot analysis, as described in the western blot protocol.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

title: In vitro kinase assay
